# EMUS Visual Identity

## Brand source
- Primary reference: EMUS logo (light and dark variants)
- Only brand color: EMUS Green

## Color palette
Primary (EMUS Green): #8BBE27
Black: #000000
White: #FFFFFF

No additional brand colors are permitted.
All UI colors must be derived from these using opacity or lightness.

## Usage rules
- Dark theme is default.
- Backgrounds: black or near-black.
- Text: white or white with reduced opacity.
- Primary green is used for:
  - Headings
  - Active navigation
  - Key metrics
  - Call-to-action elements
- Green should never dominate large backgrounds.

## Accessibility
- Minimum contrast: WCAG AA.
- Green text only on dark backgrounds.
- Avoid pure green text on white.

## Typography
- Headings: bold, technical sans-serif.
- Body: neutral sans-serif.
- No decorative or handwritten fonts.

## Tone & vibe
- Electric
- Motorsport
- Engineering-driven
- Precise, minimal, performance-oriented

## Layout principles
- Large imagery
- Strong negative space
- Clear visual hierarchy
- No unnecessary decoration
